title: Sol and the Stone
theme: Earth elemental - alchemical salamander discovers glowing cave stone

sol.color: deep amber/orange with golden belly (#E65100 body, #FFB300 belly)
sol.eyes: large round black eyes with golden highlight dots, wise but curious
sol.distinguishing_feature: three small spots on forehead that glow faintly gold when near magic
sol.expression_default: calm, curious, thoughtful - slight knowing smile
sol.body: small and smooth, about 4 inches, four splayed toes, long graceful tail
sol.personality: patient, observant, brave in a quiet way - feels things deeply

character.style_notes: Sol is serene but expressive. Simple shapes - body is elongated oval, head is round with gentle snout. Bold black outlines. Flat amber color with golden belly. The three forehead spots are subtle but always visible. Face shows quiet wonder rather than loud excitement.

art_direction.style: Expressive Minimal with mystical undertones - Mo Willems expressiveness meets Jon Klassen atmosphere. Bold black outlines, flat color fills, subtle paper texture, minimal but moody backgrounds
art_direction.mood: Quiet wonder, ancient mystery, gentle discovery
humor_techniques: Deadpan observations (Sol notices things others miss)

dual_audience.kids: Glowing magic, cave exploration, gentle triumph, cozy ending
dual_audience.adults: Alchemical symbolism (salamander=fire, stone=philosopher's stone), quiet wisdom, the joy of noticing

technical.negative_prompts: realistic, 3D render, photograph, complex background, gradient shading, scary, grotesque, text, words, letters, busy composition

art_direction.avoid: realistic style, detailed textures, scary cave imagery, complex backgrounds, generic stock illustration style

emotional_arc: curious -> exploring -> discovering -> awed -> connected -> content

pages.image_prompt: COVER IMAGE: A small amber-orange salamander (Sol) standing at the entrance of a dark cave, looking in with calm curiosity. Sol has large black eyes with golden highlights, a golden belly, and three small glowing gold spots on his forehead. The cave entrance is dark purple-brown with a hint of mysterious purple glow deep inside. Sol is small against the cave entrance, showing scale. Outside the cave: simple green grass, blue sky. Sol's posture is confident but thoughtful - one front foot slightly raised. Warm golden light on Sol contrasts with cool cave darkness. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

pages.text: The path led to a cave.

pages.beat: PAGE TURN REVEAL - the magical stone
pages.image_prompt: DRAMATIC REVEAL SHOT: A beautiful glowing stone fills most of the frame. The stone is crystalline, roughly oval, sitting on a natural rock pedestal. It glows from within - deep purple (#7C4DFF) at the core, lighter purple (#B388FF) radiating outward, with soft light (#FFF59D) at the brightest points. The glow illuminates the surrounding cave walls in gentle purple. This is the moment of wonder - the stone is clearly magical, ancient, special. It pulses gently with inner light. No Sol visible - this is all about the stone. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

CLOSE-UP on Sol's face: His expression is one of quiet awe and recognition - like meeting an old friend. Eyes wide but soft, gentle smile of understanding. His three forehead spots are now GLOWING clearly gold, responding to the stone's magic. Purple light from the stone illuminates the left side of his face. His expression says 'I knew there was something here. I was right to come.' This is not surprised excitement but satisfied discovery. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

MEDIUM SHOT: Sol (amber salamander) sitting peacefully next to the glowing purple stone. He's in a relaxed pose - settled on the cave floor, looking at the stone with calm appreciation. The stone glows gently, casting purple light on Sol. Sol's forehead spots glow gold in response. There's a sense of two beings in quiet communion - the salamander and the ancient stone. The cave around them is softly lit in purple. Peaceful, magical, connected. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

pages.beat: magic responds - the stone acknowledges Sol
pages.image_prompt: WIDE SHOT: The stone's glow has expanded, filling more of the cave with purple light. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

pages.beat: transformation moment - Sol is touched by magic
pages.image_prompt: DYNAMIC SHOT: Sol (amber salamander) is now bathed in the stone's purple-gold light. His whole body seems to glow - amber and gold intensified. His three forehead spots are blazing gold. His expression is transcendent - eyes closed, peaceful smile, arms slightly raised as if receiving a gift. Light radiates around him in gentle rays. This is the peak magical moment - Sol connected to something ancient and powerful. Not scary transformation - gentle empowerment. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

pages.beat: articulation - Sol understands what he found

The purple stone-light illuminates him softly. His expression says 'this is exactly what I was looking for, even if I didn't know it.' A moment of profound satisfaction. He has found his heart's wish - connection to something magical. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

MEDIUM SHOT: Sol (amber salamander) still sitting calmly by the stone, completely at peace. His posture is relaxed, confident, grounded. The cave feels like home now, not scary. Sol has claimed this moment. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

pages.text: Sol sat. And sat. And sat.
pages.image_prompt: WIDE PEACEFUL SHOT: Sol (amber salamander) in a comfortable sitting position next to the glowing stone. Time has passed - he's been here a while, just being present. His expression is deeply content - eyes soft, slight smile. The stone glows steadily, purple light filling the cave with warmth. Sol's forehead spots glow gentle gold. This is the payoff of patience - Sol took his time, and the reward is this peaceful communion. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

SPLIT COMPOSITION: Inside the cave, Sol (amber salamander) looks toward the distant cave entrance (visible in background) where the light has changed from bright day to warm orange sunset. The cave is lit by both the purple stone-glow (left) and warm sunset light (right). Sol's expression shows gentle acknowledgment - 'time to go.' The two lights create a beautiful color contrast. Sol begins to turn toward the exit. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

MEDIUM SHOT: Sol (amber salamander) standing up from his sitting position by the stone. His movement is calm, unhurried. He looks back at the glowing stone with a fond expression - not sad, but 'see you again.' His forehead spots still glow faintly gold. The stone seems to pulse gently in response, as if saying goodbye. Sol's body language shows he's ready to leave but carries the experience with him. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE

CLOSE-UP on Sol: He's looking back over his shoulder toward where the stone would be, with a knowing smile. His expression combines gratitude and promise - 'I'll return.' His forehead spots glow gently. There's wisdom in his eyes - he's found something precious and knows he can find it again. This is Sol's catchphrase energy but as promise rather than discovery. Simple flat cartoon style, bold black outlines, NO TEXT IN IMAGE
